answers.answer: Yea I got mine done today and im 25 weeks 4 days
At five weeks it's a bit early I did two. One around 13 weeks and the other one around 28 weeks on the 13 weeks mine drink was lime and the 28 was orange it wasn't that bad
Depends do you have a family member who is diabetic.   Then they do it several times through your pregnancy.
Yeah I did mine at 13+3. That's weird. But I loved the orange drink.
If u r a t high risk they test early
Yea my great aunt. But my friends mom has it and they didn't hers til much later in her pregnancy
My moms diabetic and I was born with sugar issue's I still got checked later

hmm... i should probably call them and find out wtf, cause there doesnt seem any reason to make me do that so soon. and i'm paranoid as hell about it! like what if they gave me something to hurt me or some mess, which i know is a retarded thought but it occasionally crosses my mind with drs
I just had my one hour test today and I'm 31weeks(:
The glucose test won't effect you or the baby I got one done earlier in my pregnancy as well idk why but I didn't question it cause there was obviously a reason.. Going on 27 weeks now
Youre suppose to get it done between 24-28 weeks

Phew I'm glad it won't mess with baby so early. Probably a tarded thought but ya never know. But I did call to ask why, they're gonna call me back tomorrow. Is it harder to do later in pregnancy? Cause morning sickness if anyone has had it at that time?

Did they tell you you had glucose in your urine? Cus I tested with high glucose in my urine so I did the orange drink at 12wks and then I'm doing it again when I go back for 27wk on June 5th. They prolly just wanted to make sure you weren't having sugar issues already
Hm they didn't tell me that but I did pee before they gave me that stuff. But I don't have diabetes either so I thought it was pretty odd to do it so early

question: Friends keep telling me they didn't do it til 2nd trimester. Is it weird I did one today o_O had to drink gross orange stuff and wait around an hour.
title: 5 weeks, glucose test, is that weird?
